text: Marcantonio De Beaumont-Bonelli was a sailor from Italy, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. ==Sources== * Category:Italian male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 8 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Italy Category:1890 births Category:Year of death missing
title: Marcantonio De Beaumont-Bonelli
